author: Juha Haataja
content:
Well, not everything coming from the U.S. is bad, even though the system seems to be totally corrupted. 

I'm currently reading Naomi Klein's book "This Changes Everything: Capitalism vs. The Climate", which is in fact a history of the capitalistic movement that is now destroying civilization. In fact, capitalism has become a religion which disregards all evidence that doesn't fit the worldview. It is a disturbing book, but gets things right.
